info.title: Operate a collapsed accordion header in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondAccordionHeader
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header
testPageDocument.getElementById('accordion2id').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, activate the acordion header.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, activate the acordion header.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Change in state to 'expanded' is conveyed
